title: Who is the owner of Big Hit Entertainment? [Music] [Kpop]? - Quora

response.answer_text: The CEO of Big Hit entertainment is Bang Si-hyuk, he is also known as “hitman bang”  (the man in the middle) Bang Si Hyuk was born in 1972 in Seoul, South Korea and grew up in a Musical Home, His Parents weren't really supportive of him pursuing music as a career. Bang Si Hyuk attended Seoul National University (One of the Top Universities in South Korea). Bang Si Hyuk then met Park Jin Young (JYP’s Boss and Founder) in the mid-1990s and they wrote songs and produced songs together. When Park Jin Young started JYP Entertainment in 1997, Bang Si Hyuk entered the company as a Producer, Composer, and arranger. In 2005, Bang Si Hyuk left JYP Entertainment and founded his own Entertainment Company which became the now-infamous Big Hit Entertainment. Big Hit Entertainment and JYP Entertainment have maintained good relations between the company and artists for a long time, 2AM which was a Daesang winning and million-single-selling group were managed between Big Hi Entertainment and JYP Entertainment from 2008 to 2014. Bang Si Hyuk has produced songs and written songs for Wonder Girls, Taegoon, 2PM, Homme, Lee Seung Gi, Teen Top, BTS, Park Jin Young (Boss of JYP), g.o.d, Im Chang-Jung, Baby V.O.X, Kim Gun-mo, Noel, Rain, K.Will, 8Eight, TXT and more. Because of the Hit Songs that he has participated in he has won many awards: Songwriter Award from Melon Music Awards 2009 and 2016Best Lyricist (Ballad), Best Songwriter (Ballad) and Masterpiece Award from Korea Music Copyright AwardsBest Producer Award from 2016 Asia Artist AwardsBest Executive Produce from 2016 MAMABest Producer Award from 2017 Golden Disc AwardsProducer of the Year from 2017 Goan Chart Music AwardsPresidential Commendation Award from Korea Content Awards 2017Producer Award from 2018 Seoul Music AwardsProducer Award from MBC Plus X Genie Awards 2019Producer of the Year from 2018 MAMAFrontier Award from Edialy Culture Awards 2018Bang Si Hyuk is regarded by many people as one of the best K-pop producers because of the Hit Songs throughout the years that he has participated in Producing. From Mic Drop from BTS to Can’t Let You Go Even If I Die by 2AM, “Hitman bang” has mastered multiple different genres of music from Hip Hop to Ballads.
